Method Detail

book

public boolean book(long roomId,
                    String customerId)
             throws RecordNotFoundException,
                    SecurityException
Book the specified hotel room.

Specified by:
book in interface RemoteRoomReservations
Parameters:
roomId - the ID of the room to book.
customerId - the customer ID to book the room for.
Returns:
true if the room was booked successfully, false if the room is already booked.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - when the specified room is not found.
SecurityException - when the room was attempted to be booked by another user, or the request to book the room timed-out.

search

public List<Room> search(String[] criteria)
Search for hotel rooms matching the specified criteria.

Specified by:
search in interface RemoteRoomReservations
Parameters:
criteria - a String array containing values that should be searched for.
Returns:
a collection of Room objects or null if none were found.
See Also:
DBAccess.findByCriteria(java.lang.String[])
